snippet: The men, who are father and son, will also be sentenced to five years’ probation and be barred for life from owning an animal for the attack on the cat last summer in their Brooklyn home.
abstract: The men, who are father and son, will also be sentenced to five years’ probation and be barred for life from owning an animal for the attack on the cat last summer in their Brooklyn home.

headline.main: In Deal, 2 Men Will Be Jailed 30 Days for Beating Cat to Death

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: American Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals
